sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuǐ shì yóu qīng hé yǎng gòuchéng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'eau est composée d'hydrogène et d'oxygène.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille au tribunal.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works at the court.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 春天的时候，到处都是花。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān de shíhou, dàochù dōu shì huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au printemps, il y a des fleurs partout.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In spring, there are flowers everywhere.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aime écrire des poèmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He likes writing poetry.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè yǒu yuánzé de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est une personne de principes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a person of principles.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè jùdà de chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un énorme succès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a huge success.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous faisons face à de nombreux défis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We face many challenges.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a remporté la compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He won the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne méprise personne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't look down on anyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ shāo yī hú shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il te plaît, fais bouillir une bouilloire d'eau pour moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please boil a kettle of water for me.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez monter au troisième étage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please go upstairs to the third floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train de descendre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is going downstairs.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个景点被列为世界遗产。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jǐngdiǎn bèi lièwéi shìjiè yíchǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce site a été classé au patrimoine mondial.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This site has been listed as a World Heritage site.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants sont en train de débattre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The students are having a debate.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner l'adresse du site web.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the website address.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son attitude est très sérieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His attitude is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件事需要你自己判断。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì xūyào nǐ zìjǐ pànduàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois juger cette affaire toi-même.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to judge this matter yourself.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ne pas toucher les objets exposés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please don't touch the exhibits.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国有很多古老的神话故事。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu hěn duō gǔlǎo de shénhuà gùshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a de nombreux mythes anciens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has many ancient myths.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有受教育的权利。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu shòu jiàoyù de quánlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chacun a le droit à l'éducation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has the right to education.
